title: Replace Current Pagination UI with Ant Design Table-Style Pagination Component
description: Replace the current custom pagination implementation in devlog list with Ant Design's Table-style pagination component for better UX and consistency with Antd design system. Currently using custom arrow buttons and simple page display - want to upgrade to full Antd pagination with page numbers, size selector, and jump functionality.

context.businessContext: Current pagination UX is minimal with just arrow buttons and page display. Users expect a full pagination component with numbered pages, quick jump options, and page size selection similar to professional data tables. Antd provides a well-designed pagination component that matches the existing design system.
context.technicalContext: Current implementation uses custom pagination in DevlogList.tsx footer with LeftOutlined/RightOutlined icons and simple page display. Need to integrate Antd's Pagination component which supports: showSizeChanger, showQuickJumper, showTotal, page numbers with ellipsis, and responsive behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: Replace custom arrow pagination with Antd Pagination component
Show page numbers with ellipsis for large page counts
Keep existing table footer layout structure
